# Statify Backend

> Real-time status page system backend built with FastAPI

## What is this?
Statify backend is a multi-tenant status page API that allows organizations to:
- Monitor and track service health status
- Log and manage incidents
- Provide real-time updates via WebSocket
- Manage users with role-based access control

## Tech Stack
- FastAPI (Python 3.10+)
- PostgreSQL with SQLAlchemy ORM
- Alembic for migrations
- JWT authentication
- WebSocket for real-time updates
- Docker deployment

## Architecture
Routes-Controller-Service pattern:
- Routes: API endpoint definitions
- Controllers: Business logic orchestration
- Services: Database operations and business rules
- Models: SQLAlchemy ORM definitions
- Schemas: Pydantic validation

## Key Features
- Multi-tenant organization support
- Real-time status updates via WebSocket
- Incident management with status tracking
- Service health monitoring
- RBAC (Role-Based Access Control)

## API Documentation
When running, access:
- Swagger UI: /docs
- ReDoc: /redoc
